Title: [Device Management][Active Devices] Verify device list loads correctly
Description: Ensure the Active Devices table loads with all device records (IMEI, Model, Type, Status, Last Seen, Vehicle, Operation, Actions).
Precondition: User is logged in; Device Management ‚Üí Active Devices page open
Steps:
1. Navigate to Device Management ‚Üí Active Devices.
2. Verify table columns and values.
Expected Result: Device list loads with correct columns and values for each device.

Title: [Device Management][Active Devices] Verify device filter by type
Description: Ensure user can filter devices by Portable/Non-Portable/All.
Steps:
1. Navigate to Active Devices.
2. Select filter Device Type = Non-Portable.
3. Repeat for Portable and All.
Expected Result: Table updates to show only selected type devices.

Title: [Device Management][Active Devices] Verify Online/Offline filter
Description: Ensure user can filter devices by Online/Offline status.
Precondition: User logged in; At least one device online, one offline
Steps:
1. Navigate to Active Devices.
2. Select filter Online.
3. Select filter Offline.
Expected Result: Only devices with selected status display.

Title: [Device Management][Edit Device] Verify device edit form
Description: Ensure Edit GPS Device form displays correct fields (IMEI, Model, Type, Protocol, SIM, Status, Assign Vehicle).
Steps:
1. From Active Devices ‚Üí Click Edit icon.
2. Verify fields displayed.
Expected Result: Edit form displays with correct values pre-filled.

Title: [Device Management][Edit Device] Verify device update
Description: Ensure updates to device fields are saved.
Steps:
1. Change Device Model.
2. Change Device Type.
3. Click Save.
Expected Result: Changes saved and visible in Active Devices list.

Title: [Device Management][Assign Vehicle] Verify vehicle assignment
Description: Ensure user can assign/change a vehicle for a device.
Steps:
1. From Active Devices ‚Üí Click Assign Vehicle.
2. Select a vehicle.
3. Save.
Expected Result: Selected vehicle assigned to device, visible in list.

Title: [Device Management][Logs] Verify device log history
Description: Ensure log history shows create, edit, assign, remove actions with timestamp.
Steps:
1. From Active Devices ‚Üí Click Log History.
2. Verify log entries.

Title: [Device Management][Removed Devices] Verify removed devices list
Description: Ensure Removed Devices table lists deleted devices with option to re-activate.
Precondition: At least one removed device exists
Steps:
1. Navigate to Device Management ‚Üí Removed Devices.
2. Verify list.
Expected Result: Removed devices displayed with IMEI, Model, Vehicle, and Activate action.

Title: [Device Management][Removed Devices] Verify device re-activation
Description: Ensure user can re-activate a removed device.
Steps:
1. From Removed Devices ‚Üí Click Activate.
2. Confirm action.
Expected Result: Device moves back to Active Devices list.

Title: [Device Management][Actions] Verify Edit Device action
Description: Ensure Edit icon opens Edit Device form with pre-filled values.
Steps:
1. Go to Active Devices.
2. Click Edit (‚úèÔ∏è) icon for any device.
Expected Result: Edit form opens with correct IMEI, Model, Protocol, etc.

Title: [Device Management][Actions] Verify Assign Vehicle action
Description: Ensure Assign Vehicle action allows selecting and saving a vehicle.
Steps:
1. Go to Active Devices.
2. Click Assign Vehicle (üìã) icon.
3. Select a vehicle.
4. Save.
Expected Result: Vehicle assigned successfully and visible in Active Devices table.

Title: [Device Management][Actions] Verify Change Vehicle assignment
Description: Ensure already assigned vehicle can be changed.
Steps:
1. Go to Active Devices.
2. Click Assign Vehicle (üìã).
3. Select different vehicle.
4. Save.
Expected Result: Vehicle mapping updated successfully in Active Devices.

Title: [Device Management][Actions] Verify Log History action
Description: Ensure Log History action shows full history of device.
Steps:
1. Go to Active Devices.
2. Click Log History (üîÑ) icon.
Expected Result: Right-side panel opens showing all log events with timestamp.

Title: [Device Management][Actions] Verify Remove Device action
Description: Ensure Remove action removes a device from Active Devices.
Steps:
1. Go to Active Devices.
2. Click Remove (üóëÔ∏è) icon.
3. Confirm action.
Expected Result: Device disappears from Active Devices and moves to Removed Devices list.

Title: [Device Management][Removed Devices] Verify removed device appears in Removed Devices
Description: Ensure removed devices are listed in Removed Devices tab.
Steps:
1. Go to Removed Devices.
2. Verify removed device is listed.
Expected Result: Removed device visible with Activate action available.

Title: [Device Management][Removed Devices] Verify removed device re-activation
Description: Ensure removed devices can be restored to Active Devices.
Steps:
1. Go to Removed Devices.
2. Click Activate.
3. Confirm.
Expected Result: Device reappears in Active Devices table.
